document.text:
From: "Wein arten, Reid" 
To:' 
Subject: . 
Date: Tue, 27 Aug 2019 19:26:26 +0000 
Thinking about what you said as we were leaving...want to make sure we are on the same page...I asked a lot of 
questions 
Sent from my BlackBerry 10 smartphone. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, August 26, 2019 11:33 PM 
To: Martin Weinberg 
Cc: Miller, Michael;
Subject: RE: Epstein 
Weingarten, Reid 
Understood—thank you for getting back to me. I'll be u late toni ht so I'd be grateful if you would please give me a call 
when you wrap up tonight. I'll be on my cell, which is id would appreciate the call. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
I  St. Andrew's Plaza 
■ 
From: Martin Weinberg 
Si aelpmir
To: 
Cc: Miller, Michael 
Weingarten, Reid 
u  ject: e: pstem 
We are still in discussion about tomorrow 
Issues of deep concern to reid, mike myself include MCC conditions and why our client died 
Go home! 
Marty 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Aug 26, 2019, at 9:56 PM, 
All, I am at my desk if you have a  moment to discuss the upcoming conference-
wrote: 
EFTA00032138

Thank you, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New Vnrle NV I nnn7 
From: 
Sent: Monday, August 26, 2019 5:31 PM 
To: Miller, 
Michael 
Cc 
Subject: RE: Epstein 
Thanks very much, Mike. 
n, Reid 
We are going to be tied up tomorrow morning up until the conference, so it would be difficult for us to meet you. 
Would you be able to bring the drive into the courthouse with you, so that we can get it from you in the courtroom? If 
not, would you by any chance be able to put the drive in an envelope marked with my name on it and leave it with 
security at 1 St. Andrews? 
Also, we are still hoping to hear from you about what your team expects to say tomorrow and your position regarding 
the subpoena we discussed. I'm available for a call any time this evening to discuss. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
From: Miller, Michael 
Sent: Monda Au ust 26 2019 3:03 PM 
To 
Cc 
Subject: Epstein 
EFTA00032139

UMW
I will get down to court a few minutes early tomorrow and can hand deliver the hard 
us with the first round of production if someone can arrange to meet me outside of the 
courthouse. Let me know if that works. More broadly, I believe that the Epstein defense team will be in 
compliance with the protective order by the time we start in court tomorrow and, if not, it will only be a matter 
of a stray clean up point or two. I'll give you more details in the morning. Mike 
Michael C. Miller 
Partner 
www.steptoe.com/mmiller 
Steptoe 
Steptoe & Johnson LLP 
1114 Avenue of the Americas 
New York, NY 10036 
www.steptoe.com 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the law firm Steptoe & Johnson LLP that may be confidential and/or privileged. If 
you are not the intended recipient. please do not read, copy, distribute. or use this information. If you have received this transmission in error, please 
notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this message. 
EFTA00032140
